name: Kickback Chrome
description:
SPACE - Jump / Shoot (in air)

Your shots get charged over time, with stronger shots sending you further backwards.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam.

CREDITS:

Max Weintraub - Design/Art
Edison Estes - Design/Art
Zachary Schwab - Programming
Evan Thaxter - Music
